title: Join our team: Sales executive wanted for Cyclist & Cycling Electric
content:
Cyclist
Join our team: Sales executive wanted for Cyclist & Cycling Electric

Are you looking to start a career in the cycling or media industry and have some experience in sales and marketing? Or are you currently working in a bike shop or elsewhere in the cycling industry and want to try something new? We’re hiring a Sales Executive to join our advertising team at Cyclist and Cycling Electric in London.

We need someone with a positive attitude who’s ready to jump in and get their hands dirty. You should have a proven record of hitting sales targets and building relationships with clients. Being organised and great at communicating (both in writing and speaking), negotiating, and presenting ideas is a must.

You’ll work with top cycling brands, grow your skills with a supportive team, and help with projects in print, digital, podcasts, and events. This is a London-based role that lets you work flexibly from home, with two days in the office per week.

We offer a competitive starting salary of £25,000, with potential for higher compensation based on candidate experience. Additionally, a performance bonus is available.

Interested? Know someone who might be? Contact Adrian Hogan at adrian.hogan@metropolis.co.uk
